definition: Five Dynasties, period of history between the fall of the Tang dynasty (907) and the founding of the Song dynasty (960), when five would-be dynasties were established in quick succession in North China
five/5
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
Five Dynasties (907-960) and Ten Kingdoms (902-979), period of political turmoil in ancient China
History of the Five Dynasties, eighteenth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Xue Juzheng 薛居正[Xue1 Ju1 zheng4] in 974 during Northern Song 北宋[Bei3 Song4], 150 scrolls

Later History of the Five Dynasties (between Tang and Song), nineteenth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Ouyang Xiu 歐陽修|欧阳修[Ou1 yang2 Xiu1] in 1053 during Northern Song Dynasty, 74 scrolls

History of the Five Dynasties (between Tang and Song), eighteenth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Xue Juzheng 薛居正[Xue1 Ju1 zheng4] in 974 during Northern Song 北宋[Bei3 Song4], 150 scrolls

sentences.english: After the downfall of the Tang Dynasty, China entered a chaotic period of the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms.
sentences.chinese: 唐朝灭亡以后，中国的历史进入五代十国的混乱时期。

sentences.english: The craft has been passed down over five generations.
sentences.chinese: 这种手艺已经传了五代。

sentences.english: The Ding Kiln porcelain appears at first in the Five Kingdoms period in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 定窑瓷最初出现在五代时期，盛于北宋初。

sentences.english: Huang Jianxin's motion pictures are unique ones among the "Fifth Generation Directors" films.
sentences.chinese: 黄建新导演是第五代导演中旗帜鲜明的个例。

sentences.english: It is said that during the Five Dynasties Period, there was a man called Li Ye.
sentences.chinese: 据说五代时期，有一个叫李邺的人。

sentences.english: The economic documents of Dunhuang temples reflect the civil accounting thoughts during the period of Tang and Five Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌寺院经济文书体现了唐五代时期的民间会计思想。

sentences.english: Chen Ziang is one of the most outstanding prose writers in the Sui, Tang and Five Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 陈子昂是隋唐五代巴蜀最优秀的散文家之一。

sentences.english: Eight materials in "Old History of the Five Dynasties" came from "XuShiShuo".
sentences.chinese: 通过《续世说》辑得《旧五代史》材料八条。

sentences.english: The Tang and Five Dynasties was an important period in the development of Chinese ancient landscape painting.
sentences.chinese: 唐五代是中国古代山水画发展过程中的一个重要时期。

sentences.english: Sui, Tang and Five Dynasties were important time for Chinese horticulture.
sentences.chinese: 隋唐五代时期是我国园艺业发展史上的重要时期。

sentences.english: To the late Tang and Five Dynasties, Zhouqu Tibetan sphere of influence is still habitat.
sentences.chinese: 唐末至五代，舟曲境仍在吐蕃势力范围。

sentences.english: The novels written by "Poems on Red Leaf" in the Tang & Five Dynasties have long enjoyed popularity since their emergence.
sentences.chinese: 唐五代“红叶题诗”小说自它产生之日起便盛传不衰。

sentences.english: It includes five generations from the aged to babies.
sentences.chinese: 五代人同照，从耄耋老人到吃奶的婴儿。

sentences.english: Yama's image developed in Tang and the following Five Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 唐五代时期是阎罗王形象的最重要的衍化期。

sentences.english: The US fifth-generation aircraft can not do this and has to decelerate for the purpose.
sentences.chinese: 而美国的第五代战机则需要减速然后发射导弹。

sentences.english: The geneses emperor of Yuan Dynasty, he is also the fifth generation Mongolia big sweat.
sentences.chinese: 元朝的开创皇帝，他也是第五代的蒙古年夜汗。
